entry.title: $2400 // Recently Renovated 2br in Clinton Hill
entry.content:
This is a recently renovated 2 br, 1 bath on the Clinton Hill/Bed Stuy border.

Apartment Features:

-Laundry In Building
-Dishwasher
-Brand New Stainless Steel Appliances
-Central Air And Heat
-Virtual Doorman

- 4 min walk to the C/S at Franklin Ave
-10 min walk to the A/C at Nostrand
-Excellent bus service along Fulton Street, get to Fort Green and DT Brooklyn in minutes!

Amazing location. Plenty of bars, restaurants and coffee shops nearby.

Call or text Matt @ show contact info to schedule a viewing.

entry.title: $2188 // 2 Bedroom 1 Bath for rent in Bed Stuy - $2188 - Minutes from the A/C $
entry.content:
Gut renovated 2-bedroom 1-bathroom apartment located in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn.

No Broker Fee! *Net rent advertised, offering 6 weeks free on a 12 month lease!

Amenities include:
Large modern Kitchen
- Stainless steel appliances, dishwasher included
- Large living room
- Spacious bedrooms
- Sun-spanked!
- Hardwood flooring throughout
- Large, shared backyard
- Pet friendly building
- Heat and hot water included
- Laundry room and bike storage in the building

4 Minute walk to the A/C trains at Utica ave.

Available now! Call or text Matt at show contact info to schedule a viewing.

Will not last!!!
